name: Midnight Prowl
description:
Midnight Prowl is a Japanese horror exploration game set in a Japanese town.

Story

I received a phone call in the middle of the night.
It was from my friend "Saito," whom I had not heard from for six months.

The protagonist was asked if he could meet him now.
The protagonist wakes his sleepy body and heads for the park where the meeting is to take place with heavy steps.

Game System

This game is primarily a "walking simulator.
It is recommended that you play with headphones.

Play Time

Depending on the player, this will be approximately 30-60 minutes.

Live game streaming

You are welcome to do so. No advance notice is required.
If you would like, we would appreciate it if you could include the URL of this store page in the summary section of the distribution page, etc.
